item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.BarCode for .NET 17.12 Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36710 Support to set QR version while generating barcode image Feature BARCODENET-36733 Setting License in Aspose.BarCode throws exception Bug BARCODENET-36726 Aspose.BarCode throw exception when used in multi threading Bug BARCODENET-36722 Setting License in Aspose.BarCode takes too long Bug BARCODENET-36690 Unable to recognize DatabarStacked barcode with big white space Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes This section lists public API changes that were introduced in Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.11 Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36687 Support to define settings “segments per row” Feature

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.10 Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36667 Remove Obsolete public API Enhancement BARCODENET-36694 Incorrect text in picture for DatabarStacked Bug BARCODENET-36652 Rotation doesn’t affected to EMF export Bug BARCODENET-36701 Incorrect DatabarLimited generation/recognition Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes This section lists public API changes that were introduced in Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.9 Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36678 Generates incorrect barcode for DatabarLimited Bug BARCODENET-36676 Generation DatabarExpandedStacked isn’t correct Bug BARCODENET-36657 Generates incorrect barcode for UPCE Bug BARCODENET-36656 Incorrect default height of Pharmacode Bug

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.8 Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36635 Ability generate a postal barcode with specified height Enhancement BARCODENET-36650 Generates incorrect barcode for EAN14 Bug BARCODENET-36632 yDimension property doesn’t work Bug

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.7 Release Notes
item.description: Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36539 Ability to find out/get the minimum height and width required for barcode image Feature BARCODENET-36622 Throws exception when using GetOnlyBarCodeImage with small size Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes This section lists public API changes that were introduced in Aspose.BarCode for SSRS 17.7. It includes not only new and obsoleted public methods, but also a description of any changes in the behavior behind the scenes in Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.4 Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36510 Improve GS1 parsing and validation Enhancement BARCODENET-36514 BarCodeBuilder allows to generate incorrect GS1 barcodes Bug BARCODENET-36491 Barcode generator accepts incorrect GS1 codetext Bug BARCODENET-36474 BarCodeBuilder.ExportToXml method is not exporting dimensions of the barcode in the XML file Bug

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.03 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services has been updated to version 17.03 and we are pleased to announce it. The following is a list of changes in this version of Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services. Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODENET-36497 Add checksum feature for Codabar Feature BARCODEREP-36 Second barcode is rendered incorrectly Enhancement BARCODEREP-34 Update EncodeType custom property for show list of available types Enhancement BARCODENET-36487 Generation GS1DataMatrix isn’t correct Enhancement Usage examples BARCODENET-36497 Add checksum feature for Codabar Code sample:

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.02 Release Notes
item.description: Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODEREP-28 Reorginize properties in Properties Window Enhancement BARCODEREP-25 Applying license for Aspose for Reporting Services on 3-server farm is showing ASPOSE on the reports Enhancement BARCODEREP-24 Barcode component is displayed incorrectly after restart Visual Studio Enhancement BARCODEREP-20 ConfigLicense tool doesn’t work correctly Enhancement BARCODEREP-33 Can’t load barcode in SSRS2014 Enhancement

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Reporting Services 17.01 Release Notes
item.description: Features and Improvements Key Summary Category BARCODEREP-17 Add support Visual Studio 2015 New Feature BARCODEREP-11 Support SSRS 2016 New Feature BARCODEREP-7 Barcode is scaled in Design view in Visual Studio Enhancement BARCODEREP-8 Margins are not taking effect Enhancement BARCODEREP-19 Padding is not taking effect Enhancement BARCODEREP-21 Barcode Alignment is different in server version and deployment version Enhancement BARCODEREP-22 Accessing the Barcde properties in design view throw exception Enhancement BARCODEREP-26 Barcode Control is Inactive in SSRS on Visual Studio 2015 Enhancement BARCODEREP-27 Barcode is not working in Visual Studio 2015 Enhancement BARCODENET-34234 BarCodeBuilder does not generate CodeText for characters: “~B” and “~C” properly for PDF417; Enhancement Usage examples: BARCODENET-34234 BarCodeBuilder does not generate CodeText for characters: “~B” and “~C” properly for PDF417;
